add_library_unity(duckdb_func_math
				OBJECT
				abs.cpp
				cbrt.cpp
				ceil.cpp
				degrees.cpp
				exp.cpp
				floor.cpp
				ln.cpp
				log10.cpp
				log2.cpp
				pi.cpp
				pow.cpp
				radians.cpp
				random.cpp
				round.cpp
				setseed.cpp
				sign.cpp
				sqrt.cpp)
set(ALL_OBJECT_FILES ${ALL_OBJECT_FILES}
                     $<TARGET_OBJECTS:duckdb_func_math> PARENT_SCOPE)
